h2_title: Where to Find the Snow Fox
content: Team this spells like a Pluck of Many to overwhelm him, and transformations. Azure Dust is good if you can keep him pinned, so you can continue with the heavy attacks and build Might for a finisher while doing so. Alternatively, Red Tides works due to the quick nature of the attacks, and the ability to inflict burn damage.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snow_Fox_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Snow Fox Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Snow Fox' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Boss - Non-Void'.
The content is as follows:
Team this spells like a Pluck of Many to overwhelm him, and transformations. Azure Dust is good if you can keep him pinned, so you can continue with the heavy attacks and build Might for a finisher while doing so. Alternatively, Red Tides works due to the quick nature of the attacks, and the ability to inflict burn damage.
